website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel Zaraca 4 is a neutral shoe that anyone can enjoy for their daily activities. It provided runners with durable protection, comfortable underfoot experience, and a well-ventilated upper unit. The shoe is a good option for those who are looking for an affordable yet reliable road running partner.
pros: The breathable upper unit features a mesh material and a thin layer of synthetic overlays for support
Most of the testers appreciated the mesh lining, which offers a comfortable in-shoe experience
Runners who have neutral foot pronation are the ones who are going to fully appreciate how the Zaraca 4 was constructed
The Gel Cushioning System, which is located in the heel area, gives shock absorption to the runner
The Asics High Abrasion Resistant rubber compound covers the outsole unit, making it more protected and secured
cons: The 4th version of the Zaraca has a moderately heavy weight
Some runners felt that the toe box of this shoe was narrow, rubbing against their toes uncomfortably

customer_reviews.title: The shoe fit quite well and looks very nice, but it broke down much faster than any ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the lower reviews I have given to ASICs overall. The shoe fit quite well and looks very nice, but it broke down much faster than any other pair of ASICs I've owned. The rubber connected at the toe started to peel back a bit after a couple weeks, the heels broke down very quickly (I will admit that I tend to slip on my shoes and this definitely breaks down the heels faster, but these performed worse compared to other shoes I have done that to), and the mesh got some small holes where it meets the rubber. Not a horrible shoe, but ASIC definitely makes better products than this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of casual work shoes that are fun, comfortable, and affordable. I purchased a pair of these for $39.99 from an Amazon Fulfilled seller (6pm LLC which is one of their main shoe sellers). Great fit (I always get running shoes a half size up from dress shoes). Comfortable for long periods of walking. Great also for running - they are pretty low profile soles so they are a more 'minimalist' style than most Asics (these guys love huge, padded, foamy soles). Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected in a nice simple white and black style
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Asics, and just after one day of wearing them walking around Disneyland I can say they are the most combfortable shoes I've ever owned. Fit as expected in a nice simple white and black style. I'm not a regular runner so I cannot really provide a critique regarding that; however, I do walk a lot and these shoes were very good for all day walking or standing.
customer_reviews.author: Isra S Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: I like Asics. The pair I bought previously are still ...
customer_reviews.text: I like Asics. The pair I bought previously are still quite comfortable but not many brands are going to survive the amount of mud I had to walk through for work one day, and any cleaning attempt was mostly in vain, so I will keep them as a backup pair for bad-weather days, yard work etc. The Zaraca 4 is lightweight and fits immediately with little or no breaking in required. I don't know how they hold up if you're a hardcore runner, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I love them all
customer_reviews.text: This is my third set of ASICS shoes, and even though they are different models, I love them all. I use these shoes as walking shoes, and love the cushioning effect for my 300lb 70yr old arthritic body! I currently walk my dog over a mile every morning and my feet feel great and my back definitely has felt much much better since I wear these shoes. Since I usually look for the best deals I have never paid more than $40 for my shoes. I can say these are by far the best shoes I've ever worn, including aire jordans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WAY too small.
customer_reviews.text: WAY too small. Ordered my son the size he was currently wearing in his Adidas but he could not get his foot into this shoe without lots of work. When he managed to do it, his big toe was visibly poking out the front of the shoe. Maybe a sizing error in this particular show?
customer_reviews.author: Techie Working Mother

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, very durable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, very durable. Have lasted me longer than I expected. Bought a pair before these ones last summer. Having broken both my ankles in the past, they are very comfortable and have not given me any issues. Would buy again if they are still available.
customer_reviews.author: Ulysse

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Comfortable For Work Or Just Casual Wear
customer_reviews.text: Really love these shoes! I mainly wear them for work, I work in a factory on concrete all day & these shoes are really comfortable (you can tell they have gel cushion in them). It fits well to me (not too big & not too small). The color looks like it does in the picture. I previously wore Nike's for work & for awhile now my feet would always hurt after work, but since I bought these Asics my feet feel good. I'm definitely buying Asics from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most athletic shoes these days claim to have some unique support system that makes their shoe better than the competition
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think that the gel sole would make must of a difference. Most athletic shoes these days claim to have some unique support system that makes their shoe better than the competition. But these shoes are actually amazing with the gel. I have used them for just about everything now. They are great in the gym on the treadmill. The lower impact on my heels is an great feeling. I recommend these to anyone who walks or runs often.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Howland

customer_reviews.title: Good, but it probably is for hard running
customer_reviews.text: Good, but it probably is for hard running, the north face probably is softer and comfortable, also nike fr runner was much softer, but some may like it. The north face size is 10 for me, also asics is 10, but this one is slightly tight, however I hope it will widen after month of usage
customer_reviews.author: mukhran

customer_reviews.title: Great  value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shoes as an every day after work tennis shoe. They fit great, and I couldn't be happier. I normally wear the Nike Pegasus or Vomero when I run. Not quite sure these have the cushioning for running, but great for every day at half the price of the Nikes that I enjoy wearing.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Runs 1/2 size smaller than other asics
customer_reviews.text: For some reason these were slightly too small although I ordered a 10.5. My husband wears a 10 and he always has me order slightly larger for Asics. Would have returned them for a larger size had it been a reasonable time frame from purchase to time he opened the box to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: ASICS, YAS
customer_reviews.text: YES! Talked him into the Asics and he loves them! Said they are more comfortable than the old Nikes! Yes, score one for me! Wears Size 12 so got him a Size 12. I love the way that they look and I think he does as well. A++++, Asics! Will probably be buying another pair :)
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and light on the feet too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He's always been wearing Nike shoes all his life but I thought of having him try this. He is very difficult to please with when it comes to sneakers but this one to my surprise fits him perfectly (size 10 regular). He said it's also lighter than his Nike and thus been wearing it everyday to work ( I guess I need to buy him another Asics shoes to have an alternate pair for work).
customer_reviews.author: Yanagurl

customer_reviews.title: Light as feather shoes !!!
customer_reviews.text: l have been wearing zaraca2 over a couple of years and its so comfy and light as feather. I feel zaraca4 has more stylish design and snug fit on my feet . I was afraid that the blue color will be more bright but its kinda dark blue Since i am not a runner, i cant comment on how good these shoes are for running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits better than Adidas!
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and I feed very good fit for me. I have also Adidas Performance Barricade and adidas Speed Trainer because I like Adidas design but this Asics running is better fit for me. I wear Adidas as casual every day use but for serious running, I use this Asics running shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light weight shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, light weight shoes. I wear them every day, and walk a few miles through NYC and they seem to hold up pretty well. I used to wear Ultimate 81s which i loved, but found them to lack the support or durability of heavier duty shoes. These are a good middle ground for me. Light weight, great design, reasonably priced.

customer_reviews.title: I freaking LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I freaking LOVE these shoes. I had bought the black pair some time ago. Then I decided that they are SO comfortable that I needed another pair, so I got the red ones. You will not regret this purchase (unless you have weird feet or something....Ha!).

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that I was not able to try these further
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same size I always do for asics, but these were rather small comparatively speaking. Disappointed that I was not able to try these further.

customer_reviews.text: I have somewhat wide feet, and my pinky toe hits the side and sometimes gets caught on the side where the mesh and the fabric meet. Overall not bad, but can't wear them for more than a couple hours.

customer_reviews.title: Good, just not great support/comfort
customer_reviews.text: Good sneaker that's very light, though not as much support or cushion that I have come to expect from ASICS. Little arch support. Overall, a very wearable shoe, but not my favourite.

customer_reviews.text: My never ending quest to find the best sneaker for me continues. I have always loves Asics and this pair is excellent. Very comfortable and the colors really pop, Indigo Blue/Silver/Black. I could not be happier with them.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy to wear all day
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. I've purchases a second set for when the 1st ones go bad. These have been on a couple vacations where I have spent 10+ hours walking around the city sightseeing or at theme parks and they are great. No foot pain at all.

customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He says They're more comfortable than not wearing shoes. Fit as expected. Not for extensive long distance running, but he uses them for running around or short jogs.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan E. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: A little too firm for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for aerobic walking on the treadmill at the gym. This review doesn't apply to running applications. I've loved all my previous Asics (first the Gel-Cumulus, then the GEL-Excel33). I realize these are slightly lower profile than the Excel33, but I still expected similar cushioning, just less of it. While I love the fit of these shoes, the soles feel firm and don't give nearly as much cushioning as the Excel33. My old man knees ache a bit when wearing these, but not with my previous Asics. I like that they aren't all neony, so they go nicely with a pair of jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for real life but not real running.
customer_reviews.text: If you looking for a very comfy, relaxed, lightweight, airy and cool shoe that look like something iron man might wear while making lunch... These things are awesome. Zero break in time, easy to wear with anything and they have a metallic sheen that owns the room. The graphics are a little less obnoxious compared to most shoes today. If you are looking a serious training shoe for street pounding marathons, this is not even in the ballpark. But they are awesome for running around the office, making some casual meetings, picking up kids... You know real life. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: yet comfortable and great for leisure use
customer_reviews.text: An average quality shoe, yet comfortable and great for leisure use. Not sure if they will take a lot of usage.

The length was fine, but the width was really narrow and they didn't fit him at all! He found a different Asics shoe that had a wide size and he ordered those, and they fit great. He's never purchased wide shoes before, so I guess it is just this brand. These are pretty shoes, but the size disappointment is really a bummer!

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more happy with the fit
customer_reviews.text: For years I have worn Asics high end shoes (like the Nimbus series) for any cardio activity. The fit and durability are unmatched. This time I chose to go with a lighter weight, mid range shoe for summer running in a near by park. Per usual, I couldn't be more happy with the fit, support and weight of the shoe. Having worked in the shoe industry for quite some time in the past, Asics were the brand I would recommended over and over to customers for the best support and fit. Looks like the standard still holds!

customer_reviews.text: I read reviews from many women that said they are for men. Which was nice because I could buy my size accordingly. I was in love with these the moment I saw them on Amazon and I had to get them. I took measurement of my feet+ my old ASICS+ googled which men's shoe size would fit a women's size 7 and then I ordered for a size 6. It was perfect! It is exactly my shoe size, comfortable and everything I wanted. Can't wait to run in them!

product_meta.title: ASICS Mens Gel-Zaraca 4-M Gel-Zaraca 4-m
product_meta.description: The gel-zaraca 4 is perfect for runners seeking lightweight cushioning with everyday comfort. With rear foot gel cushioning system and seamless construction, this value-packed shoe will delight neutral runners of all abilities.
feature_bullets: Breathable running shoe in 360-degree mesh with striped external overlays at laces
